file_insights.changes_summary: Added webhook trigger for failover events in both warm pool and CPU standby strategies
key_modifications: Added import for trigger_webhooks from webhook_service
Added user_id parameter to execute_failover method
Added asyncio.create_task to fire webhooks for both warm_pool and cpu_standby strategies
Webhook payload includes detailed failover event information

patterns_discovered: Consistent webhook payload structure across different failover strategies
gotchas_discovered: Potential performance overhead from creating async tasks for each failover event
Lack of explicit error handling for webhook trigger failures
Dependency on an external webhook_service module
recommendations: Add error handling for webhook triggers
Consider rate limiting or batching webhook events
Implement logging for webhook trigger attempts
